frame.name: m00n Cabal Check
frame.subtitle: Retro portal into the m00n cabal
frame.description: Step into a purple 8-bit dungeon, authenticate with Farcaster, and discover whether you are part of the $m00n airdrop cabal. Eligible wallets see their allocation, loot-tier lore, share buttons, and receipts; everyone else gets the torches and a locked gate.
frame.tagline: Reveal your $m00n fate in monad purple.
frame.ogDescription: Authenticate with Farcaster, check the $m00n airdrop ledger, and unlock loot-tier lore if you are in the cabal.
